attributes.action: Listen To the British Public and Hold a Vote on a motion of Confidence in Our Present Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if as gordon brown states that he is acting on behalf of the people, by staying in office to sort out the expenses scandal. i would like him to allow the british people to vote on a motion of confindence in this present parliament, so that we can at least voice an opinion in what has transpired.
